name: MKPolylineRenderer
desc: A visual representation of any polyline overlay object.

items.name: init(polyline: MKPolyline)
items.desc: Creates a new overlay view using the specified polyline overlay object

items.name: var polyline: MKPolyline
items.desc: The polyline overlay object that contains the information used to draw the overlay.

items.name: var strokeStart: CGFloat
items.desc: The unit distance along the line where the stroke starts.

items.name: var strokeEnd: CGFloat
items.desc: The unit distance along the line where the stroke ends.
